name: The Matador
summary_text: A globetrotting hitman and a crestfallen businessman meet in a hotel bar in Mexico City in an encounter that draws them together in a way neither expected.

name: Million Dollar Arm
summary_text: A sports agent stages an unconventional recruitment strategy to get talented Indian cricket players to play Major League Baseball.

name: Cats
summary_text: A tribe of cats called the Jellicles must decide yearly which one will ascend to the Heaviside Layer and come back to a new Jellicle life.

name: Ava
summary_text: Ava is a deadly assassin who works for a black ops organization, traveling the globe specializing in high profile hits. When a job goes dangerously wrong she is forced to fight for her own survival.

name: The Company Men
summary_text: The story centers on a year in the life of three men trying to survive a round of corporate downsizing at a major company - and how that affects them, their families, and their communities.

name: If Beale Street Could Talk
summary_text: A young woman embraces her pregnancy while she and her family set out to prove her childhood friend and lover innocent of a crime he didn't commit.

name: From Here to Eternity
summary_text: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

name: Highlander II: The Quickening
summary_text: In the future, Highlander Connor MacLeod must prevent the destruction of Earth under an anti-ozone shield.

name: The Meyerowitz Stories
summary_text: An estranged family gathers together in New York City for an event celebrating the artistic work of their father.

name: Candy
summary_text: A poet falls in love with an art student who gravitates to his bohemian lifestyle -- and his love of heroin. Hooked as much on one another as they are on the drug, their relationship alternates between states of oblivion, self-destruction, and despair.

name: Ladyhawke
summary_text: The thief Gaston escapes the dungeon of medieval Aquila through the latrine. Soldiers are about to kill him when Navarre saves him. Navarre, traveling with his spirited hawk, plans to kill the bishop of Aquila with help from Gaston.

name: Starred Up
summary_text: Eric Love, 19, is locked up in prison. On his first day, he assaults another inmate and several guards. He's offered group therapy and his dad, an inmate as well, tries to talk sense into him. Can he be rehabilitated?

name: Kung Pow: Enter the Fist
summary_text: A rough-around-the-edges martial arts master seeks revenge for his parents' death.

name: Grumpy Old Men
summary_text: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

name: Two for the Money
summary_text: After suffering a career-ending knee injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
summary_text: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
summary_text: The adventures of a 12 year old who is fresh out of elementary and transitions to middle school, where he has to learn the consequences and responsibility to survive the year.

name: Howard the Duck
summary_text: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a struggling female rock singer.

name: Starman
summary_text: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and makes her drive him across the country. The government tries to stop them.

name: Glory Road
summary_text: In 1966, Texas Western coach Don Haskins led the first all-black starting line-up for a college basketball team to the NCAA national championship.

name: Nights of Cabiria
summary_text: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

name: Hard Eight
summary_text: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

name: The Counterfeiters
summary_text: The story of the Operation Bernhard, the largest counterfeiting operation in history, carried out by Germany during WWII.

name: Stolen
summary_text: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

name: Judas and the Black Messiah
summary_text: Offered a plea deal by the FBI, William O'Neal infiltrates the Illinois chapter of the Black Panther Party to gather intelligence on Chairman Fred Hampton.

name: The Haunted Mansion
summary_text: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

name: Honey
summary_text: Honey is a sexy, tough music video choreographer who shakes up her life after her mentor gives her an ultimatum: sleep with him or be blacklisted within their industry.

name: Lage Raho Munna Bhai
summary_text: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

name: One Fine Day
summary_text: The lives of two strangers and their young children unexpectedly intersect on one hectic, stressful day in New York City.

name: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
summary_text: Teenager Darren Shan meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a vampire. After a series of events, Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque du Freak, becoming a creature of the night.

name: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
summary_text: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

name: Hoosiers
summary_text: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

name: When We First Met
summary_text: Noah meets Avery at a Halloween party and falls in love but gets friend-zoned. 3 years later, she's engaged to someone else. Noah returns in a time machine to fix things.

name: When a Stranger Calls
summary_text: During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.

name: Flatliners
summary_text: Five medical students, obsessed by what lies beyond the confines of life, embark on a daring experiment: by stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near-death experience - giving them a firsthand account of the afterlife.

name: The Double Life of Véronique
summary_text: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

name: The Colony
summary_text: Forced underground by the next ice age, a struggling outpost of survivors must fight to preserve humanity against a threat even more savage than nature.

name: Striptease
summary_text: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

name: Dhoom 3
summary_text: When Sahir, a circus entertainer trained in magic and acrobatics, turns into a thief to take down a corrupt bank in Chicago that ruined his father, Indian officers Jai and Ali are called to catch him.

name: The Good Girl
summary_text: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.

name: Sherlock Jr.
summary_text: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

name: Proof
summary_text: The daughter of a brilliant but mentally disturbed mathematician, recently deceased, tries to come to grips with her possible inheritance: his insanity. Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students, who wants to search through his papers, and her estranged sister, who shows up to help settle his affairs.

name: The Legend of Drunken Master
summary_text: A young martial artist is caught between respecting his pacifist father's wishes or stopping a group of disrespectful foreigners from stealing precious artifacts.

name: The Last Picture Show
summary_text: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

name: 1 - Nenokkadine
summary_text: A rock star must overcome his psychological inhibitions to seek revenge for his parents' death.

name: CHIPS
summary_text: A rookie officer is teamed with a hardened pro at the California Highway Patrol, though the newbie soon learns his partner is really an undercover Fed investigating a heist that may involve some crooked cops.

name: Labor Day
summary_text: Depressed single mom Adele and her son Henry offer a wounded, fearsome man a ride. As police search town for the escaped convict, the mother and son gradually learn his true story as their options become increasingly limited.

name: Slow West
summary_text: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

name: G-Force
summary_text: A specially trained squad of guinea pigs is dispatched to stop a diabolical billionaire from taking over the world.

name: DOA: Dead or Alive
summary_text: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, an invitational martial arts contest. There, four female rival fighters will have to work together to uncover the secret that the organizer of the tournament is trying to hide.

name: Somewhere
summary_text: After withdrawing to the Chateau Marmont, a passionless Hollywood actor reexamines his life when his eleven-year-old daughter surprises him with a visit.

name: Laura
summary_text: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

name: In the Shadow of the Moon
summary_text: A Philadelphia police officer struggles with a lifelong obsession to track down a mysterious serial killer whose crimes defy explanation.

name: Thirst
summary_text: Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.

name: Ma
summary_text: A lonely woman befriends a group of teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

name: The Boss
summary_text: A titan of industry is sent to prison after she's caught insider trading. When she emerges ready to rebrand herself as America's latest sweetheart, not everyone she screwed over is so quick to forgive and forget.

name: Lilya 4-Ever
summary_text: Sixteen-year-old Lilja and her only friend, the young boy Volodja, live in Russia, fantasizing about a better life. One day, Lilja falls in love with Andrej, who is going to Sweden, and invites Lilja to come along and start a new life.

name: Fear
summary_text: When Nicole met David; handsome, charming, affectionate, he was everything. It seemed perfect, but soon she sees that David has a darker side. And his adoration turns to obsession, their dream into a nightmare, and her love into fear.

name: The Return
summary_text: In the Russian wilderness, two brothers face a range of new, conflicting emotions when their father - a man they know only through a single photograph - resurfaces.

name: District 13: Ultimatum
summary_text: Damien and Leito return to District 13 on a mission to bring peace to the troubled sector that is controlled by five different gang bosses, before the city's secret services take drastic measures to solve the problem.

name: Sophie's Choice
summary_text: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

name: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
summary_text: The young apprentice of a magical, eccentric toy store owner learns to believe in herself, and in her friends, upon learning some grave news about the future.

name: Police Academy 3: Back in Training
summary_text: The alumni of Commandant Lassard's Police Academy (1984) return to the school to train new recruits and prevent its closure.

name: Once Upon a Time in Anatolia
summary_text: A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.

name: Creepshow
summary_text: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales inspired by the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

name: Life as a House
summary_text: When a man is diagnosed with terminal cancer, he takes custody of his misanthropic teenage son, for whom quality time means getting high, engaging in small-time prostitution, and avoiding his father.

name: Judy
summary_text: Legendary performer Judy Garland arrives in London in the winter of 1968 to perform a series of sold-out concerts.

name: Deconstructing Harry
summary_text: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.

name: Rising Sun
summary_text: When an escort girl is found dead in the offices of a Japanese company in Los Angeles, detectives Web Smith and John Connor act as liaison between the company's executives and the investigating cop Tom Graham.

name: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
summary_text: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the horrible events of Hellraiser (1987), where the occult-obsessive head doctor resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites and their demonic underworld.

name: Fever Pitch
summary_text: Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.

name: Free Fire
summary_text: Set in Boston in 1978, a meeting in a deserted warehouse between two gangs turns into a shoot-out and a game of survival.

name: Imperium
summary_text: A young FBI agent, eager to prove himself in the field, goes undercover as a white supremacist.

name: Swimming Pool
summary_text: A British mystery author visits her publisher's home in the South of France, where her interaction with his unusual daughter sets off some touchy dynamics.

name: Tooth Fairy
summary_text: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.

name: Pathfinder
summary_text: A Viking boy is left behind after his clan battles a Native American tribe. Raised within the tribe, he ultimately becomes their savior in a fight against the Norsemen.

name: Marighella
summary_text: Facing a violent military dictatorship and an intimidated opposition, writer-turned-politician Carlos Marighella articulates a resistance all the while ousting heinous crimes of torture and the infamous censorship instituted by the regime.

name: The Girl in the Spider's Web
summary_text: Young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander and journalist Mikael Blomkvist find themselves caught in a web of spies, cybercriminals and corrupt government officials.

name: True Grit
summary_text: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.

name: MacGruber
summary_text: Former special operative MacGruber is called back into action to take down his arch-enemy, Dieter Von Cunth, who's in possession of a nuclear warhead and bent on destroying Washington, D.C.

name: Paper Moon
summary_text: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

name: The Pink Panther 2
summary_text: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

name: My Best Friend's Girl
summary_text: Tank faces the ultimate test of friendship when his best friend hires him to take his ex-girlfriend out on a lousy date in order to make her realize how great her former boyfriend is.

name: Congo
summary_text: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

name: Planes
summary_text: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

name: The Peanuts Movie
summary_text: Snoopy embarks upon his greatest mission as he and his team take to the skies to pursue their archnemesis, while his best pal Charlie Brown begins his own epic quest back home to win the love of his life.

name: Baby Mama
summary_text: A successful, single businesswoman who dreams of having a baby discovers she is infertile and hires a working class woman to be her unlikely surrogate.

name: Conviction
summary_text: A working mother puts herself through law school in an effort to represent her brother, who has been wrongfully convicted of murder and has exhausted his chances to appeal his conviction through public defenders.

name: Udaan
summary_text: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

name: The Italian Job
summary_text: Comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

name: Dark Places
summary_text: Libby Day was only eight years old when her family was brutally murdered in their rural Kansas farmhouse. Almost thirty years later, she reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime and uncovers the wrenching truths that led up to that tragic night.

name: War Machine
summary_text: An idiosyncratic general confronts opposition from enemies, allies, and bureaucrats while leading a massive rebuilding operation in Afghanistan.

name: Short Cuts
summary_text: The day-to-day lives of several suburban Los Angeles residents.

name: Ginger Snaps
summary_text: Two death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their suburban neighborhood, must deal with the tragic consequences when one of them is bitten by a deadly werewolf.

name: Fan
summary_text: Gaurav develops an obsession with a movie star who looks just like him. He goes to Bombay to meet his idol, but he refuses to grant him five minutes of his time. Gaurav is enraged and plots to destroy his hero.

name: Freaks
summary_text: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

name: Nine
summary_text: Famous film director Guido Contini struggles to find harmony in his professional and personal lives, as he engages in dramatic relationships with his wife, his mistress, his muse, his agent, and his mother.

name: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
summary_text: A fun-loving American bulldog pup, a hilarious Himalayan cat, and a wise old golden retriever embark on a long trek through the rugged wilderness of the Sierra Nevada mountains in a quest to reach home and their beloved owners.

name: The Big Year
summary_text: Two bird enthusiasts try to defeat the cocky, cutthroat world record holder in a year-long bird-spotting competition.

name: Blood Work
summary_text: Still recovering from a heart transplant, retired F.B.I. profiler Terry McCaleb (Clint Eastwood) returns to service when his own blood analysis offers clues to the identity of a serial killer.

name: Curse of the Golden Flower
summary_text: During China's Tang dynasty the emperor has taken the princess of a neighboring province as wife. She has borne him two sons and raised his eldest. Now his control over his dominion is complete, including the royal family itself.

name: Vivarium
summary_text: A young couple looking for the perfect home find themselves trapped in a mysterious labyrinth-like neighborhood of identical houses.

name: Look Who's Back
summary_text: Adolf Hitler wakes up in the 21st century. He quickly gains media attention, but while Germany finds him hilarious and charming, Hitler makes some serious observations about society.

name: Gone
summary_text: A woman is convinced her kidnapper has returned when her sister goes missing.

name: Time Lapse
summary_text: Three friends discover a mysterious machine that takes pictures twenty-four hours into the future, and conspire to use it for personal gain, until disturbing and dangerous images begin to develop.

name: Dead Ringers
summary_text: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

name: Big Stan
summary_text: A weak con man panics when he learns he's going to prison for fraud. He hires a mysterious martial arts guru who helps transform him into a martial arts expert who can fight off inmates who want to hurt or love him.

name: To the Bone
summary_text: A young woman, dealing with anorexia, meets an unconventional doctor who challenges her to face her condition and embrace life.

name: Maggie
summary_text: A teenage girl in the Midwest becomes infected by an outbreak of a disease that slowly turns the infected into cannibalistic zombies. During her transformation, her loving father stays by her side.

name: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
summary_text: Two dim-witted, inseparable friends hit the road for their ten-year high school reunion and concoct an elaborate lie about their lives in order to impress their classmates.

name: Fired Up!
summary_text: The two most popular guys in high school decide to ditch football camp for cheerleader camp. For the girls and for the glory.

name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
summary_text: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

name: Happy Feet Two
summary_text: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

name: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
summary_text: Dream-haunting Freddy Krueger returns once again to prowl the nightmares of Springwood's last surviving teenager, and of a woman whose personal connection to Krueger may mean his doom.

name: Laggies
summary_text: In the throes of a quarter-life crisis, Megan panics when her boyfriend proposes, then, taking an opportunity to escape for a week, hides out in the home of her new friend, 16-year-old Annika, who lives with her world-weary single dad.

name: Tangerines
summary_text: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.

name: Holy Motors
summary_text: From dawn to dusk, a few hours in the shadowy life of a mystic man named Monsieur Oscar.

name: Dr. Dolittle 2
summary_text: Dolittle must save a forest and a bear's life.

name: Ben-Hur
summary_text: Judah Ben-Hur, a prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, an officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge, but finds redemption.

name: Blair Witch
summary_text: After discovering a video showing what he believes to be his vanished sister Heather, James and a group of friends head to the forest believed to be inhabited by the Blair Witch.

name: The Enforcer
summary_text: San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with female partner Inspector Kate Moore, with whom he's not too excited to be working.

name: Varsity Blues
summary_text: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

name: Frenzy
summary_text: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

name: The Reaping
summary_text: A former Christian missionary, who specializes in debunking religious phenomena, investigates a small town which seems to be suffering from the 10 biblical plagues.

name: Trespass
summary_text: As they're held for ransom, a husband and wife's predicament grows more dire amid the discovery of betrayal and deception.

name: The Damned United
summary_text: The story of the controversial Brian Clough's 44-day reign as the coach of the English football club Leeds United.

name: Gia
summary_text: The story of the life of Gia Carangi, a top fashion model from the late 1970s, from her meteoric rise to the forefront of the modeling industry, to her untimely death.

name: Miracle on 34th Street
summary_text: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

name: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
summary_text: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

name: Guns Akimbo
summary_text: A guy relies on his newly-acquired gladiator skills to save his ex-girlfriend from kidnappers.

name: Edtv
summary_text: A video store clerk agrees to have his life filmed by a camera crew for a television show.

name: The River Wild
summary_text: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

name: Alone in the Dark
summary_text: A detective of the paranormal slowly unravels mysterious events with deadly results.

name: Better Off Dead...
summary_text: After his girlfriend ditches him for a boorish ski jock, Lane decides that suicide is the only answer. However, his increasingly inept attempts bring him only more agony and embarrassment. Filled with the wildest teen nightmares.

name: Teeth
summary_text: Still a stranger to her own body, a high school student discovers she has a physical advantage when she becomes the object of male violence.

name: A Wrinkle in Time
summary_text: After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him.

name: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid
summary_text: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

name: Shutter
summary_text: A young photographer and his girlfriend discover mysterious shadows in their photographs after a tragic accident. They soon learn that you can not escape your past.

name: People Like Us
summary_text: While settling his recently deceased father's estate, a salesman discovers he has a sister whom he never knew about, leading both siblings to re-examine their perceptions about family and life choices.

name: Stuber
summary_text: A detective recruits his Uber driver into an unexpected night of adventure.

name: Cradle 2 the Grave
summary_text: A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.

name: Unsane
summary_text: A young woman is involuntarily committed to a mental institution, where she is confronted by her greatest fear - but is it real or a product of her delusion?

name: The Visitor
summary_text: A college professor travels to New York City to attend a conference and finds a young couple living in his apartment.

name: Ju-on: The Grudge
summary_text: A mysterious and vengeful spirit marks and pursues anybody who dares enter the house in which it resides.

name: Arizona Dream
summary_text: A young New Yorker goes to Arizona where he finds freedom to both love and dream.

name: Monte Carlo
summary_text: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.

name: Jaws: The Revenge
summary_text: Chief Brody's widow believes that her family is deliberately being targeted by another shark in search of revenge.

name: The Inbetweeners 2
summary_text: Jay, Neil, Simon, and Will reunite in Australia for a holiday.

name: Celal and Ceren
summary_text: Celal, who dreams of achieving happiness as a womanizer, soon gets into difficulties and suffers misfortune. Back when Celal was in a relationship, he was jealous of the life of a bachelor.

name: The House of the Devil
summary_text: In 1983, financially struggling college student Samantha Hughes takes a strange babysitting job that coincides with a full lunar eclipse. She slowly realizes her clients harbor a terrifying secret, putting her life in mortal danger.

name: Downton Abbey
summary_text: The continuing story of the Crawley family, wealthy owners of a large estate in the English countryside in the early twentieth century.

name: Pawn Sacrifice
summary_text: Set during the Cold War, American chess prodigy Bobby Fischer finds himself caught between two superpowers and his own struggles as he challenges the Soviet Empire.

name: The Do-Over
summary_text: Two down-on-their-luck guys decide to fake their own deaths and start over with new identities, only to find the people they're pretending to be are in even deeper trouble.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child
summary_text: The pregnant Alice finds Freddy Krueger striking through the sleeping mind of her unborn child, hoping to be reborn into the real world.

name: Casualties of War
summary_text: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

name: Byzantium
summary_text: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a local resort.

name: The Dirt
summary_text: Based on the bestselling autobiography from Mötley Crüe, the film is an unflinching tale of success and excess as four misfits rise from the streets of Hollywood to the heights of international fame.

name: Fahrenheit 451
summary_text: In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.

name: Clash of the Titans
summary_text: Perseus must battle Medusa and the Kraken to save the Princess Andromeda.

name: The House
summary_text: After the town takes away their daughter's college scholarship, a couple start an illegal casino in their friend's house to make back the money.

name: Stronger
summary_text: Stronger is the inspiring real life story of Jeff Bauman, an ordinary man who captured the hearts of his city and the world to become a symbol of hope after surviving the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing.

name: The Poseidon Adventure
summary_text: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

name: The Spy Next Door
summary_text: Former C.I.A. spy Bob Ho takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids, who haven't exactly warmed to their mom's beau.

name: Flyboys
summary_text: The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.

name: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
summary_text: The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.

name: Sudden Impact
summary_text: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

name: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
summary_text: Alexander's day begins with gum stuck in his hair, followed by more calamities. However, he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother and sister - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

name: Notorious
summary_text: The life and death story of The Notorious B.I.G. (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

name: Trust
summary_text: A teenage girl is targeted by an online sexual predator.

name: The Lazarus Effect
summary_text: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

name: After
summary_text: A young woman falls for a guy with a dark secret and the two embark on a rocky relationship. Based on the novel by Anna Todd.

name: Bird on a Wire
summary_text: An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.

name: Roxanne
summary_text: The large-nosed C.D. Bales is in love with the beautiful Roxanne; she falls for his personality but another man's looks.

name: The Sessions
summary_text: A man in an iron lung who wishes to lose his virginity contacts a professional sex surrogate with the help of his therapist and priest.

name: The Old Man & the Gun
summary_text: Based on the true story of Forrest Tucker and his audacious escape from San Quentin at the age of 70 to an unprecedented string of heists that confounded authorities and enchanted the public.

name: A Hologram for the King
summary_text: A failed American sales rep looks to recoup his losses by traveling to Saudi Arabia and selling his company's product to a wealthy monarch.

name: The Dead Pool
summary_text: Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.

name: Friends with Kids
summary_text: Two best friends decide to have a child together while keeping their relationship platonic, so they can avoid the toll kids can take on romantic relationships.

name: Rock Star
summary_text: Lead singer of a tribute band becomes lead singer of the real band he idolizes.

name: The Avengers
summary_text: Two British Agents team up to stop Sir August de Wynter from destroying the world with a weather-changing machine.

name: The Producers
summary_text: After putting together another Broadway flop, down-on-his-luck producer Max Bialystock teams up with timid accountant Leo Bloom in a get-rich-quick scheme to put on the world's worst show.

name: Michael
summary_text: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
summary_text: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Shin seiki evangerion (1995).

name: Hope Springs
summary_text: After thirty years of marriage, a middle-aged couple attends an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

name: The Hitcher
summary_text: A serial killer pins his crimes on two college students who gave him a ride.

name: Sleeping with Other People
summary_text: A good-natured womanizer and a serial cheater form a platonic relationship that helps reform them in ways, while a mutual attraction sets in.

name: Bobby
summary_text: The story of the assassination of U.S. Senator Robert F. Kennedy, who was shot in the early morning hours of June 5, 1968 in the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles, California, and twenty-two people in the hotel, whose lives were never the same.

name: Behind The Candelabra
summary_text: A chronicle of the tempestuous six-year romance between megastar singer Liberace and his young lover Scott Thorson.

name: Suburbicon
summary_text: As a 1950s suburban community self-destructs, a home invasion has sinister consequences for one seemingly normal family.

name: 20th Century Women
summary_text: The story of a teenage boy, his mother, and two other women who help raise him among the love and freedom of Southern California of 1979.

name: Mirror
summary_text: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

name: One for the Money
summary_text: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

name: Before I Wake
summary_text: A couple adopt an orphaned child whose dreams - and nightmares - manifest physically as he sleeps.

name: Big Momma's House 2
summary_text: An FBI agent reprises his disguise as a corpulent old lady and takes a job as a nanny in a crime suspect's house.

name: East of Eden
summary_text: Two brothers struggle to maintain their strict, Bible-toting father's favor.

name: Balls of Fury
summary_text: Down-and-out former professional ping-pong phenom, Randy Daytona, is sucked into a maelstrom when FBI Agent Ernie Rodriguez recruits him for a secret mission. Randy is determined to bounce back and win, and to smoke out his father's killer -- arch-fiend Feng.

name: Dirty Pretty Things
summary_text: Illegal immigrants Okwe and Senay work at a posh London hotel and live in constant fear of deportation. One night Okwe stumbles across evidence of a bizarre murder setting off a series of events that could lead to disaster or freedom.

name: The Last Kiss
summary_text: Michael'd have a great job, still have his 4 best friends, and be in love with a beautiful girl at 30. He loves Jenna but his life seems predictable until he meets a college girl. It seems that everybody's having relationship problems.

name: Belle de Jour
summary_text: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

name: Of Mice and Men
summary_text: A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

name: Withnail & I
summary_text: In 1969, two substance-abusing, unemployed actors retreat to the countryside for a holiday that proves disastrous.

name: Manhattan Murder Mystery
summary_text: A middle-aged couple suspects foul play when their neighbor's wife suddenly drops dead.

name: Last Knights
summary_text: A fallen warrior rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master.

name: God's Not Dead
summary_text: College philosophy professor Mr. Radisson's curriculum is challenged by his new student, Josh, who believes God exists.

name: Fred Claus
summary_text: Fred Claus, Santa's bitter older brother, is forced to move to the North Pole to help Santa and the elves prepare for Christmas in exchange for cash.

name: A Thousand Words
summary_text: After stretching the truth on a deal with a spiritual guru, literary agent Jack McCall finds a Bodhi tree on his property. Its appearance holds a valuable lesson on the consequences of every word he speaks.

name: Stake Land
summary_text: In a world of vampires, an expert vampire hunter and his young protégé travel toward sanctuary.

name: The Call of the Wild
summary_text: A sled dog struggles for survival in the wilds of the Yukon.

name: Rob Roy
summary_text: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

name: Guess Who
summary_text: A young woman, Theresa, brings her boyfriend, Simon, home to meet her parents and surprise them with the news of their engagement. Another surprise: Simon is white.

name: A Hard Day's Night
summary_text: Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live television performance.

name: Endless Love
summary_text: The story of a privileged girl and a charismatic boy whose instant desire sparks a love affair made only more reckless by parents trying to keep them apart.

name: Raees
summary_text: A bootlegger sets out to improve his community as a promising leader but falls in a political trap.

name: Police Academy 4: Citizens on Patrol
summary_text: The misfit Police Academy (1984) graduates now are assigned to train a group of civilian volunteers to fight crime once again plaguing the streets.

name: The Great Outdoors
summary_text: A Chicago man and his family go camping with his obnoxious brother-in-law.

name: The Tenant
summary_text: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

name: The Ward
summary_text: An institutionalized young woman becomes terrorized by a ghost.

name: Taxi 3
summary_text: Out to stop a new gang disguised as Santa Claus, Emilien and Daniel must also handle major changes in their personal relationships.

name: The Skeleton Twins
summary_text: Having both coincidentally cheated death on the same day, estranged twins reunite with the possibility of mending their relationship.
A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men.

name: Annie
summary_text: A spunky young orphan is taken in by a rich eccentric, much to the chagrin of the cantankerous woman who runs the orphanage.

name: In America
summary_text: A family of Irish immigrants adjust to life on the mean streets of Hell's Kitchen while also grieving the death of a child.

name: Striking Distance
summary_text: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

name: Taxi
summary_text: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

name: The Kid
summary_text: An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when he is mysteriously confronted by an eight-year-old version of himself.

name: Enough
summary_text: After running away fails, a terrified woman empowers herself in order to battle her abusive husband.

name: Stone
summary_text: A convicted arsonist looks to manipulate a parole officer into a plan to secure his parole by placing his beautiful wife in the lawman's path.

name: Hubie Halloween
summary_text: Despite his devotion to his hometown of Salem (and its Halloween celebration), Hubie Dubois is a figure of mockery for kids and adults alike. But this year, something is going bump in the night, and it's up to Hubie to save Halloween.

name: Ironclad
summary_text: In thirteenth-century England, a Knights Templar and a few of the Barons men fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.

name: Amarcord
summary_text: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

name: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
summary_text: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
summary_text: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.

name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
summary_text: Flighty teenage girl Buffy Summers learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

name: North Country
summary_text: A fictionalized account of the first major successful sexual harassment case in the United States, Jenson vs. Eveleth Mines, where a woman who endured a range of abuse while working as a miner filed and won the landmark 1984 lawsuit.

name: A Room with a View
summary_text: Lucy meets George in a Florence pensione and the two share a brief romance before Lucy returns home, where she becomes engaged to Cecil. However, it isn't long before George unexpectedly enters her life again.

name: Balto
summary_text: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

name: The Forest
summary_text: A woman goes into Japan's Suicide Forest to find her twin sister, and confronts supernatural terror.

name: Cujo
summary_text: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

name: Transamerica
summary_text: A preoperative transgender woman takes an unexpected journey when she learns that she fathered a son, now a teenage runaway hustling on the streets of New York.

name: Brick Mansions
summary_text: An undercover Detroit cop navigates a dangerous neighborhood that's surrounded by a containment wall with the help of an ex-con in order to bring down a crime lord and his plot to devastate the entire city.

name: Absolutely Anything
summary_text: A group of eccentric aliens confers a human being with the power to do absolutely anything, as an experiment.

name: Piranha 3DD
summary_text: After the events at Lake Victoria, the pre-historic school of blood-thirsty piranhas make their way into a newly opened waterpark.

name: Jaws 3-D
summary_text: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

name: Zelig
summary_text: "Documentary" about a man who can look and act like whoever he's around, and meets various famous people.

name: Morgan
summary_text: A corporate risk-management consultant must decide whether or not to terminate an artificially created humanoid being.

name: Heartbreak Ridge
summary_text: Hard-nosed, hard-living Marine Gunnery Sergeant Tom Highway (Clint Eastwood) clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.

name: Shadow of the Vampire
summary_text: The filming of Nosferatu (1922) is hampered by the fact that its star Max Schreck is taking the role of a vampire far more seriously than seems humanly possible.

name: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones
summary_text: When a young man becomes the target of a malevolent entity, he must uncover its true intentions before it takes complete control of him.

name: Idle Hands
summary_text: A teenage slacker's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

name: The Tale of The Princess Kaguya
summary_text: Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthralls all who encounter her, but ultimately she must confront her fate, the punishment for her crime.
